note: Some conflicts affect several regions. The sum across all regions can therefore be higher than the global number.
title: Rate of state-based conflicts
subtitle: The number of conflicts divided by the number of all states. This accounts for the changing number of states over time. Included are [interstate](#dod:interstate-ucdp), [intrastate](#dod:intrastate-ucdp), and [extrasystemic](#dod:extrasystemic-ucdp) conflicts that were ongoing that year.
